lines.text: Mother! You're alive!
Too bad *you*... will DIE!
The fate of the universe will be decided as it should be...
...in MORTAL KOMBAT!
Nothing can alter your fate, nor mine.
I can, and I *will*.
My squads have already claimed thousands of innocent souls on Earth.
And I will claim billions.
By now you'd be behind bars on display in a zoo.
If those bars could keep me away from you, Sheeva, I would welcome them!
Silence! What is your report?
Two of earth's best warriors have already been taken. Kabal and Stryker.
Tell me, did you make them beg for the lives before you destroyed them?
But, Master, I thought if I let them live...
I have no use for excuses! Rain, this will never happen again.
It will never happen again.
Cool, huh? It's my Animality.
[grabbed Kitana after teleportation towards Kitana]
Suckers!
[Scorpion disappeared with Kitana]

[ready to fight fight Motaro]
Mr. Ed is mine.

[ready to fight Sindel]
I'll take my mother.

[ready to fight Ermac]
Leftovers are fine with me!
[watching Liu Kang and Kitana escape]
The date's over.
Death is the only way out. Major Briggs, Sonya Blade. Shao Kahn will be pleased.
Shao what?
[after ripping off Jax's cybernetic arm]
Without your weapons, you are no match for Motaro.
[while fighting Jax, Motaro rips off one of his cybernetic arms]
Without your weapons, you are *no* match for Motaro!
[first lines]

[narrating]
Mortal Kombat is not about death, but rather the preservation of life. Liu Kang and a few chosen fighters from the Earth realm defeated Outworld sorcerer Shang Tsung. According to the rules of Mortal Kombat, their victory preserved the safety of the Earth for one more generation. Our chosen ones were returned to Liu Kang's home on Earth, only to enjoy a brief period of peace... for someone from Outworld has a different point of view.

[after Killing off Rain]
It's true, this will never happen again. It's also true I need a new general. Either die on duty or by my hand, the choice is yours.
Centaurs are known for their hunting prowess. As your general, i will personally hunt down every human soul and spare no one.
Motaro can't be trusted, being the personal protector of queen Sindel, your orders are mine to follow.
While they waste their energy with their snivelings I would gather hundreds of thousands of souls, for you.
No. You all are far too impetuous for such important work.
[Points to Sindel]
You, are my new general, Queen Sindel. Unless someone has a different point of view.
The Earth was created in six days; so too shall it be destroyed; and on the seventh day, mankind will rest... in peace!
Rayden, you cannot die.
I am proud to die... a mortal.
Tell me, did you make Rayden beg for his life before you killed him?
Rayden, is of no concern to us.
You let him *live*!
Whenever you're ready, Rayden.
[Shao-Kahn has Sonya in a headlock]
Kahn, you hide behind a human?
Why not, Lord Rayden? You've hidden behind them your entire pathetic life!
You said Rayden was no longer to be feared.
I *am* to be feared for if you fail me now, I will feed you rotting corpse to the worms!
You will *fail*!
You will never win!
[Liu Kang has pinned Jade]
First you betray me, and now you laugh?
Let's see what I'm made of.
If I'm going to die today, please tell me why.
Nobody told me why Johnny had to die.
Impressive, but not for long!

[to Rayden]
Man, you got one dysfunctional family, you know that?
If your Father's an Elder God, what does that make Kahn?
Kahn is my brother.
Kitana?
You wish!
Get over here!
There's so little time left.
Whatever time we have, we must use well.
Are we really ready to die here?
If we die, we will die in battle. Together.
It is also true I need a new general. You can die in duty or buy my hand, the choice is yours.

Years ago, my father had agreed that his heir to the family throne must be strong enough to kill his own brother in battle if necessary. I beat my brother, but I could not kill him. Only one thing is certain; Khan must die.
This time, you're going to kill him.
I could not then, I cannot now.
So, what do we do?
You will do your best! It is all that can be expected. I will pray for you all.
This is not good!
Listen to me, Liu is our only hope.
I want to fight Khan, but I don't know if I'm ready.
You must believe in yourself Liu. We believe in you.
Feel your Animality!
Of all the horrors darkness holds; to die alone, that is my worst fear.
[Sonya performs her flame kiss fatality on Cyrax, destroying him instantly]
Man, you barbecued his ass!
[Rayden is trying to open a portal to Outworld]
My powers are leaving me.

[to Sonya]
Who does this dude think he is? Moses parting the Red Sea?
It is not my fault. I did everything you ordered.
It was your job to lure them to an ambush. If they have escaped, then you failed me!
We could never have stopped them alone.
Listen to her. She speaks the truth. We would have died trying.
You... you're already dead.
You should have killed me... when you had the chance... brother.
My brother died a long time ago. His heart, anyway.
you... WILL FAIL!
I... can feel... IT!
[Liu Kang then morphs into a dragon]
[Sonya looks at Liu Kang with a look of amazement on her face]
Aw, *now* I seen everything!
[Sonya is double-teamed by Ermac and Noob Saibot]
Jax! Help!
[watching Liu Kang transform into a dragon]
Ah, now I done seen everything.

[noticing Jax's enhancements]
What's the deal with your arms?
I've known you one minute and you dissin' me already?
I mean no disrespect. You have real skills. Those arms aren't your strength, they're your weakness.
Show's what you know, these things right here, state of the art.
Faith in yourself is all you need,
[to the others]
and I say that to all of you.
[Jax shakes Jade's hand, obviously blown away by her good looks]
You got an incredible set of legs... for kicking I mean.
[looks at him]

[Shao-Kahn has Jonny Cage in a headlock]
Surrender now, Raiden, or this one dies!

[Coming into the Temple of the Elder Gods]
I have come to the Eternal Palace. Because your sacred rules have been broken. Shao Kahn has invaded the Earth.
[Then, the dark place turns into the temple]
As always Lord Rayden, you are granted 3 questions.
This one must be, why was this treachery ever allowed?
We do not control the destiny of men.
Everybody possesses the ability to change their fate.
So, you will stand by and watch the ruination of Earth?
You are correct, believing Princess Kitana is the key to closing Kahn's portals
But, if I reunited her with Sindel, how can I be sure that the portals will stay closed until the next tournament?
Only if Shao Kahn is destroyed should the future be safe.
By living amongst the humans, do you really care for them?
More than I can remember.
Do you love them so much to sacrifice your immortality?
[Rayden thinks about his deicsion]
How can you hope to defeat Shao Kahn when I alone am too much for you!
Wait a minute; that tattoo, I've seen it before; on a robot and a woman. They both tried to kill me.
